analysis.description: ElyXToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol#362-365) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol:
	Contract ElyXToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol#165)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ElyXToken.claimToken (/unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol#339-345) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_to,_value) (/unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol#341-342)

ElyXToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol#362-365)
	- /unique_chucks/28/0xa65583468acb993864fa1e437e69318a76f3d9f0.sol#365
